scenario: Visa Inc. V was upgraded to Buy from Neutral by Seaport analyst Jeff Cantwell with a price target of $359. The analyst raised forecasts for 2025 and 2026, exceeding consensus estimates. Key drivers include a firming U.S. economy in the second half of 2024, stronger service/data processing revenue, and higher demand for value-added services from clients. The analyst projects double-digit revenue growth for 2025 and 2026, with 13% EPS growth in both years. The upcoming Investor Day in February is seen as a positive catalyst. In a turbulent macro environment, Visa is viewed as a steady earnings compounder with upside potential.
